author: Socrates
quotes: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
Be as you wish to seem.
We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
The only good is knowledge and the only evil is ignorance.
To find yourself, think for yourself.
The secret of happiness, you see, is not found in seeking more, but in developing the capacity to enjoy less.
He who is not contented with what he has, would not be contented with what he would like to have.
Beware the barrenness of a busy life.
False words are not only evil in themselves, but they infect the soul with evil.
He is wealthiest who is content with the least.
The end of life is to be like God, and the soul following God will be like Him.
Life without examination is not worth living.
Wisdom begins in wonder.
Let him who would move the world first move himself.
Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm and constant.
The hottest love has the coldest end.
The greater the difficulty, the more glory in surmounting it. Skillful pilots gain their reputation from storms and tempests.
Death may be the greatest of all human blessings.
The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
The unexamined life is not worth living.
Beauty is a short-lived tyranny.
He is a man of sense who does not grieve for what he has not, but rejoices in what he has.
To know thyself is the beginning of wisdom.
I know that I am intelligent, because I know that I know nothing.
The way to gain a good reputation is to endeavor to be what you desire to be thought to be.
Wonder is the beginning of wisdom.
Strong minds discuss ideas, average minds discuss events, weak minds discuss people.
An honest man is always a child.
The wisest are the most annoyed at the loss of time.
True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing.
I cannot teach anybody anything, I can only make them think.
Employ your time in improving yourself by other men's writings, so that you shall gain easily what others have labored hard for.
The hour of departure has arrived and we go our ways; I to die, and you to live. Which is better God only knows.
It is better to change an opinion than to persist in a wrong one.
The only true wisdom is knowing that you know nothing.
The way to gain a good reputation is to endeavor to be what you desire to appear.
He is richest who is content with the least.
By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
I am not an Athenian or a Greek, but a citizen of the world.
If you don't get what you want, you suffer; if you get what you don't want, you suffer; even when you get exactly what you want, you still suffer because you can't hold on to it forever.
To move the world we must first move ourselves.
The children now love luxury; they have bad manners, contempt for authority; they show disrespect for elders and love chatter in place of exercise.

True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.
The beginning of wisdom is the definition of terms.

author: Plato
quotes: The only good is knowledge and the only evil is ignorance.

You can learn little from victory, you can learn everything from defeat.
The soul which has no fixed purpose in life is lost; to be everywhere, is to be nowhere.
The madness of love is the greatest of heaven's blessings.

No one is a friend to his friend who does not love in return.
Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.
Education is the kindling of a flame, not the filling of a vessel.
A good decision is based on knowledge and not on numbers.
Where there is reverence there is fear, but there is not reverence everywhere that there is fear, because fear presumably has a wider extension than reverence.
At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
The eye of the soul, which is called the mind, is the chief guide of life.

No man should bring children into the world who is unwilling to persevere to the end in their nature and education.

Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.

Knowledge which is acquired under compulsion obtains no hold on the mind.
The beginning is the most important part of the work.
Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others.
Courage is knowing what not to fear.

author: Aristotle
quotes: The more you know, the more you realize you know nothing.

The wise man does not expose himself needlessly to danger, since there are few things for which he cares sufficiently; but he is willing, in great crises, to give even his life.

The educated differ from the uneducated as much as the living from the dead.
What lies in our power to do, it lies in our power not to do.

It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
Hope is a waking dream.
The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
The unexamined life is not worth living.
The whole is greater than the sum of its parts.

The more you know, the more you know you don't know.

Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
No man loves life like him that's grown old.

We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

Quality is not an act, it is a habit.

The secret to humor is surprise.
The high-minded man must care more for the truth than for what people think.
Change in all things is sweet.

No great mind has ever existed without a touch of madness.
The only true wisdom is knowing that you know nothing.

The object of education is to teach us to love what is beautiful.
The highest good is like water, which nourishes all things without trying to.

Without friends no one would choose to live, though he had all other goods.

Happiness depends upon ourselves.
Good habits formed at youth make all the difference.

Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.
The soul never thinks without a picture.
The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.
The aim of the wise is not to secure pleasure, but to avoid pain.

author: Confucius
quotes: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.

To see what is right and not do it is want of courage or of principle.

The superior man makes the difficulty to be overcome his first business, and success only a subsequent consideration.

He who knows only his own side of the case knows little of that.

The world is a complicated thing, much more complicated than we are aware of.
A picture is a fact.
A man will be imprisoned in a room with a door that's unlocked and opens inwards; as long as it does not occur to him to pull rather than push.
A serious and good philosophical work could be written consisting entirely of jokes.
The limits of my language mean the limits of my world.
A nothing would never be anything.
The world is everything that is the case.
Not how the world is, but that it is, is the mystery.
If people never did silly things nothing intelligent would ever get done.
If one tried to advance the trite metaphor that life is a journey, one could perhaps describe philosophy as a sort of coaching inn at which one may stay for a little while.
The world is all that is the case.
If people never did silly things, nothing intelligent would ever get done.
The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
Death is not an event in life: we do not live to experience death.
The aspects of things that are most important for us are hidden because of their simplicity and familiarity.

author: Martin Heidegger
quotes: Man is nothing else but what he makes of himself.
To be is to be perceived.

In language lies the power of life.
The only way to understand the world is to experience it.
The essence of truth is its simplicity.

The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.

Truth is disclosed in the clash of opinions.
To think is to confine oneself to a single point of view.
Philosophy is the art of thinking about thinking.
Thinking is not an idle chatter.
The only way to keep moving forward is to let go of the past.
The only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
The only way to bring about real change is to start from the inside.
The only courage that matters is the kind that gets you from one moment to the next.
The only way to truly understand another person is to listen without judgment.
The only thing that remains constant is change.
The real is more than the existent.
The only thing that matters is how well you walk through the fire.
The only way to know what is truly real is to peer into the depths of your own heart.
Thinking is a song of the living.
The only way to understand being is to speak of it.
The world is a thing of wonder.
The only way to make sense of life is to embrace the uncertainties of existence.
The only way to get rid of temptation is to yield to it.

What is decisive is not what we know but what we do.
The only way to achieve true success is to express yourself completely.
Only a god can save us.
The beginning of knowledge is the discovery of something we do not understand.

author: Jean-Paul Sartre
quotes: All human actions are equivalent and all are on principle doomed to failure.
Do you think that in order to be or to seem moral one must renounce one's freedom?
Words are more treacherous and powerful than we think.
The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
Life has its own hidden forces which you can only discover by living.
Three o'clock is always too late or too early for anything you want to do.
Freedom is what you do with what's been done to you.
The more sand has escaped from the hourglass of our life, the clearer we should see through it.
The poor don't know that their function in life is to exercise our generosity.
The one who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to a point that he does not discern any truth either in himself or anywhere around him.
Man makes himself. He isn't ready-made.
Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
Life is a series of collisions with the future; it is not the sum of what we have been, but what we yearn to be.
Existence precedes essence.
The only way to a life of immortality is to die daily.
Life begins on the other side of despair.
The most basic of all human needs is the need to understand and be understood.
The truth is that we are always living in an absurd world.
We are our choices.
The only way to prepare for life is to live it.
We do not choose to be born. We do not choose our parents. We do not choose our historical epoch, the country of our birth, or the immediate circumstances of our upbringing.
If you are lonely when you're alone, you are in bad company.
Life has no meaning the moment you lose the illusion of being eternal.
The greatest moral struggle is to be what we are.
The struggle itself towards the heights is enough to fill a man's heart. One must imagine Sisyphus happy.
Man is a project that proceeds from nothing to something.
Freedom is nothing but a chance to be better.
Man must live and create. Live to the point of tears.
We only become what we are by the radical and deep-seated refusal of that which others have made of us.
The more conscious you become of yourself as a being in a world, the more you feel your lack of identity.

A human being is not one in pursuit of happiness but rather in search of a reason to become happy, lastingly and consistently.
The most radical revolutionary will become a conservative the day after the revolution.
The only thing that could spoil a day was people. People were always the limiters of happiness except for the very few that were as good as spring itself.

Forgiveness is the only way to reverse the irreversible sequence of the past.
The moment we no longer have a free press, anything can happen.

If we are to live in a civilized world, then it is important that we should be able to tolerate different points of view.
If we are uncritical we shall always find what we want: we shall look for, and find, confirmations, and we shall look away from, and not see, whatever might be dangerous to our pet theories.
We must plan for freedom, and not only for security, if for no other reason than that only freedom can make security secure.
It is impossible to speak in such a way that you cannot be misunderstood.
The more we learn about the world, the more we realize how little we know.
Doubt is not a pleasant condition, but certainty is an absurd one.

The idea of a single scale of intellectual authority is one that should be dropped, not because it is meaningless but because it is misleading.

Philosophy is a conversation, and in a conversation one cannot prove a point but can only hope to persuade.

The way to bring about the desired changes in values and behavior is to control opinion, to censor the news, and to deny people access to information.

The general public is not really aware of the threat of nuclear war. They're not aware of the fact that the scientists have told us very clearly that if there is a nuclear war it could be the end of the human race.
Any dictator would admire the uniformity and obedience of the U.S. media.
Education is a system of imposed ignorance.

We can't be guided by wishful thinking and magical thinking. We have to be guided by reality.

The smart way to keep people passive and obedient is to strictly limit the spectrum of acceptable opinion, but allow very lively debate within that spectrum.
The media serve as an instrument of power, used by those in control to shape and manipulate public opinion.

quotes: The anxiety of our era has to do with fantasized possibilities of what is yet to come.

Where there is power, there is resistance.

quotes: A picture held us captive. And we could not get outside it, for it lay in our language and language seemed to repeat it to us inexorably.

A person can be philosophical only when he has ceased to be religious.

The only way to find peace of mind is to accept yourself for who you are.
The only way to be truly happy is to be grateful for what you have and to keep an open mind.

The only way to make progress is to keep learning and never stop growing.
The only way to understand the world is to learn from it.
The only way to gain knowledge is through experience.
The only way to find truth is by searching for it in the facts.
The only way to make a change is to take the first step.
The only way to find peace is to accept the things you cannot change, have the courage to change the things you can, and never give up on yourself.
It is a rule of logic that nothing can happen without a cause.
The only way to make real progress in philosophy is to make sure that your views are always consistent with the facts.
The only way to gain wisdom is through experience.

The only way to understand the universe is to explore it.

The only way to be sure of anything is to test it.
The only way to be sure of the truth is to test it.
The only way to know what is right is to seek the truth.
The only way to make a lasting impression is to do something that makes a difference in the world.

author: John Dewey
quotes: The object of education is to prepare the young to educate themselves throughout their lives.

Failure is instructive. It is the handmaiden of success.
Growth itself contains the germ of happiness.
We only think when we are confronted with problems.
If we teach today as we taught yesterday, we rob our children of tomorrow.

The total experience of a common man is an infinite treasury.

quotes: All education must be self-education. A teacher can only point the way, not do the journey for you.
When you do something, you should burn yourself up completely, like a good bonfire, leaving no trace of yourself.
Culture is not a luxury, but an essential necessity of life.
To know oneself, one should assert oneself.

The wise learn more from fools than fools from the wise.

When you look into an abyss, the abyss also looks into you.

Man is condemned to be free.

What we think determines what we feel.
The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
If you want to be happy, be.
The beauty of the world, which is so soon to perish, has two edges, one of laughter, one of anguish, cutting the heart asunder.
What is seen is only a part of what is there.
Truth is the agreement of our ideas with the reality of things.
We must learn to listen to the language of the world.
A true dialogue cannot exist unless both parties are willing to change.
The truth of art lies in its power to break the monopoly of established reality to define what is real.
In the application of a theory, it is not the theory that is being judged, but the person using it.
Play is the highest form of research.
It is the power of the mind to be unconquerable.
Only the educated are free.
Seek not to understand that you may believe, but believe that you may understand.
The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only one page.
You can tell the size of a man by the size of the thing that makes him angry.
To be sure, the power of words is not to be underestimated. But how can we forget that the power of deeds is much greater?
Experience is not what happens to you; it's what you do with what happens to you.
What we call real estate - the solid ground to build a house on - is the broad foundation on which nearly all the guilt of this world rests.
It is not enough to have a good mind; the main thing is to use it well.
The past can be creative, not just a burden to be borne.
The worst enemy of truth and freedom in our society is the compact majority.
Truth is not found in books, it is found in nature.
The nature of language is such that any true utterance can be understood by all.
When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
What is important is not what is seen but what is unseen.
Change is not merely necessary to life - it is life.
Being human always points, and is directed, to something, or someone, other than oneself - be it a meaning to fulfill or another human being to encounter.
Beliefs and values are the foundation of a person's life.
The aim of an interpretation is to make the whole of the text present.
If something is to stay in the memory it must be burned in: that is the meaning of tradition.
The ultimate meaning of life is to appreciate the glory of God.
The only thing that makes life possible is permanent, intolerable uncertainty; not knowing what comes next.
What is essential in a work of art is that it should rise far above the realm of personal likes and dislikes.
The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
All real living is meeting.
Nothing is so firmly believed as what is least known.
Nothing great in the world has ever been accomplished without passion.
He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
The only way to get rid of a temptation is to yield to it.
To be human is to be involved in relationships.
When I can look life in the eyes, grown calm and very coldly wise, life will have given me the truth, and taken in exchange - my youth.
Difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage.
Thinking is the talking of the soul with itself.
It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
What we learn with pleasure we never forget.
It is the task of education to form the mind of the individual.
No one is so foolish as to choose war over peace. In peace sons bury their fathers, in war fathers bury their sons.
Culture is the process of creating something out of the raw material of experience.

Where there is no trust, there is no love.

Understanding is more than just knowing. It is the ability to apply knowledge to a situation in a wise way.
Art is the objectification of feeling.
All that we learn is to unlearn.
Where understanding ends, philosophy begins.
I am not a teacher, but an awakener.
You must be prepared to give up your knowledge in order to gain understanding.
What matters is not the idea a man holds, but the depth at which he holds it.
What we need is not more knowledge, but a fresh appreciation of what we know.

To be creative means to be in love with life. You can be creative only if you love life enough that you want to enhance its beauty, you want to bring a little more music to it, a little more poetry to it, a little more dance to it.
The authority of those who teach is often an obstacle to those who want to learn.
When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
To be conscious is not merely to be awake, but to be aware.
Where there is love there is life.
The whole is more than the sum of its parts.
We must learn to reawaken and keep ourselves awake, not by mechanical aid, but by an infinite expectation of the dawn, which does not forsake us in our soundest sleep.
Knowledge is not a passion from without the mind, but an active exertion of the inward strength, vigor and power of the mind.
Genuine dialogue is based on giving and receiving, on being open to the other.
The work of art is brought into the world not just to be gazed upon, but to be actively engaged with.
The ultimate aim of all science is the interpretation of man in the world.
We should never allow ourselves to be so easily contented.
Wealth is not the same as money.
What we remember from history is not necessarily what happened.

Achievement of your happiness is the only moral purpose of your life, and that happiness, not pain or mindless self-indulgence, is the proof of your moral integrity, since it is the proof and the result of your loyalty to the achievement of your values.
The task of the modern educator is not to cut down jungles, but to irrigate deserts.
There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
It is only when we forget all our learning that we begin to know.
Faith is not about everything turning out okay; it is about being okay no matter how things turn out.

The hermeneutical task is to make the text come alive, to make the past present, to make the present meaningful, and to understand the present in the light of the past.
Interpretation is the task of bringing the past back to life, of making the present meaningful, of understanding the present in the light of the past.
The hermeneutical circle is the oscillation between the horizons of understanding and the text.
The hermeneutical task is to make present what is past, to show that the meaning of a text is not exhausted by its intentional structure.
The task of interpretation is to make the past present, to make the present meaningful, to understand the present in the light of the past.
The task of hermeneutics is to make present what is past.
The hermeneutical task is to understand the text in its fullness, to make the past present, and to make the present meaningful.
The hermeneutical circle is a circle of infinite regress that is broken only when the interpreter finds a resting place in the full sense of the text.
The hermeneutical question is not, 'What does this text mean for me?' but, 'What does this text mean in itself and for us?'
The task of hermeneutics is to show that the meaning of a text is not exhausted by its intentional structure but that it opens up to an infinity of interpretations.
The hermeneutical task is to make the text come alive, to make the past present.
Hermeneutics is the art of understanding, of making the past present and of making the present meaningful.

A text is not a line of words releasing a single “theological” meaning (the “message” of the Author-God) but a multi-dimensional space in which a variety of writings, none of them original, blend and clash.

author: Donald Davidson
quotes: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

The most important thing in life is to be able to think for yourself.

author: Amartya Sen
quotes: We must recognize that poverty and development are inextricably linked.
We must all accept the fact that the world is a common resource and that human beings everywhere have an equal claim to the benefits that it offers.
Development must be more than the simple accumulation of material goods. It must be more than economic growth, important as that is. It must involve the improvement of human capabilities.
Development is not only about the elimination of poverty, but also about the expansion of freedom.
People are not mere receptacles of material goods; they are not just beneficiaries of development; they are agents, claimants and authors of development.
Economic growth and social justice must go together. They are two sides of the same coin.
A society’s well-being depends not only on the production of goods, but also on the fruits of intellectual and artistic creativity.
We must recognize the fact that the pursuit of reason and the quest for excellence are universal human aspirations, not the prerogatives of Westerners.
We must accept that some poverty is an inevitable outcome of a competitive economy.
The quest for development must be seen as a quest for people’s wellbeing and freedom.

author: John McDowell

A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.

The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking.

Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

If you hear a voice within you say “you cannot paint,” then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going.
Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.

Understanding is the first step to acceptance, and only with acceptance can there be recovery.
Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

The goal of all life is death.

author: Paul Tillich
quotes: The truth that is told with bad intent beats all the lies you can invent.
